reviews.text: Everytime I have an appointment I come here, the food is great, the people are always welcoming, the music is not too loud is just right. The smoothies are amazing.

While the atmosphere is lively, it can be a bit overwhelming when it affects communication. A more balanced approach would definitely enhance the overall experience."

They basically stole money from me. I placed an order online (via toast). A female employee calls telling me they didn‚Äôt have a delivery person available to bring my order. And that the order had to be canceled. She assured me I would get a refund once the owner was informed. I called multiple times afterwards asking for the refund without any success. It has been over 30 days and I still haven‚Äôt received the money. I will be filing a complaint with the SBA bureau.

If I can give a zero star review I would. I ordered food to be delivered to my home and my order was incomplete and I paid cash. I called back to let them know and I waited more than an hour for my food to be delivered and they called me back after all that time to let me know that because my address is too far they couldn't bring it. I waited over two hours to not get my food back or my money back.

Lamentablemente se est√°n da√±ando, los primeros d√≠as todos tuvo delicioso pero ya hacen las cosas a lo loco.  La chica que atiende es muy amable eso si tengo que decirlo pero por favor cambien o entrenen a la persona que hace la comida. Por que pagar por algo mal echo y quemado no esta bien.

Ordered a smoothie and a quesadilla. They both tasted okay, nothing special. The music in there was a bit too loud for me. The whole experience was just okay. The staff was nice, it was my first time there. The place was clean.

I came into the restaurant and ordered a cheese burger but for some reason it had this slice of ham in it when I got home, I ordered cheese burgers from there before and I never had something like this in it. Another thing is that I don‚Äôt know if they ran out of yellow cheese but I when I removed the burger bun it had, what I‚Äôm assuming is mozzarella cheese I think because normally when I ordered the last two times they didn‚Äôt ask if I wanted a specific cheese on the burger. I ordered cheese burgers before from this place and the last two times had yellow cheese and never had a slice of ham on it either. I‚Äôm confused as to why they put ham on my cheeseburger anyway because the ham is something I didn‚Äôt order on the burger.

My experience dining in was interesting and telling. While waiting for my order i saw one of the workers come in from the next door produce store. She came in and immediately stored everything she just purchased directly in the front bins. She did not wash any of the vegetables or fruits. It was unpleasant to witness. She claimed they wash them once someone orders but i did not witness that happen when someone came in to order a juice. Service was not great. Not friendly individuals.

Llame y pregunte primero que tiempo para deliver o para yo recojer y me dicen 20 min a los 45 min llamo y me dicen si la comida esta lista pero no sabos el tiempo del delivery guy. Le dije que si ellos no saben lo que me van a traer una comida fria me dicen que no que 5 min. Cuando el driver llama con una actitud que el estaba abajo le digo que me espere que voy a bajar me dice yo tengo mas delivery que hacer y yo le respondo si yo espere 1hry 10 min el me puede esperar un 1 min. Cuando cojo la comida todo estaba frio y me falto el jugo que pedi. Deberian de mejorar el costumer services o darle clase de como tratar a un cliente.

Everything here is delicious and fresh to my understanding. I waited a while and it was fine everything was hot and so yummy definitely will be returning. Come here if you're looking for fried food fun especially with its late night hours! And check out our video on IG @JadaExploresAll!

This is BY FAR the best food spot in the city. Their food is amazing, the customer service is top notch, the vibes are immaculate and, on top of that, they always have great music playing.
